full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 205 of 236 1109 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 Q. And that goes up to the second floor landing; is that right? 2 A. It does, sir. 3 Q. And if you go to the right, when you get to the top of the 4 landing, that is the hallway that heads to the master bedroom 5 suite; right? 6 A. True. 7 Q. And we saw some of the photos of those rooms in your 8 testimony; right? 9 A. True. 10 Q. But if you go to the left, there is another hallway that 11 leads to a series of what are labeled guest rooms? 12 A. True. 13 Q. It looks like one is called the red room, guest room 5 is 14 called the red room; is that right? 15 A. That, I don't know. 16 MR. EVERDELL: If we can call up just the left-hand 17 portion of that exhibit with the guest rooms to the landing on 18 the second floor. 19 THE COURT: You're getting a little quiet there. 20 MR. EVERDELL: I'm sorry. If we can call up just the 21 left-hand portion of the diagram where the guest rooms are. 22 Q. Is that easier to see? 23 A. It is, sir. Thank you so much. 24 Q. You're welcome. You see that one is labeled guest room 3, 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012719
